titleStmt.title: The path-way to please God Which way whomsoeuer walketh, especially in the time of anie worldly affliction, shalbe defended against all temptations.
titleStmt.author: Wallis, Thomas, fl. 1583.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Jaggard [sold by Iohn Hammon, dwelling in Angell-alley in Aldersgate street,

notesStmt.note: Bookseller's name and publication date from colophon.
Identified as STC 24991a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
